summary: The Defense Logistics Agency's Procurement Technical Assistance Centers provide training to businesses interested in government contracting. DLA has a system for measuring how these centers perform, but it can't easily tell whether the centers are meeting goals. DLA also delegated performance reviews to other agencies before FY 2021. title: Procurement Technical Assistance Program: Opportunities Exist for DOD to Enhance Training and Collaboration
